text: David Mark Rothbard (Born November 6, 1964 in Bridgeport, Connecticut - Died March 30, 2018 in Bel Air, Maryland) was President of the Committee For A Constructive Tomorrow (CFACT), a non-profit organization he founded with Craig Rucker in 1985 "to promote a positive voice on environment and development issues." Rothbard, also, co-hosted with CFACT Executive Director, Craig Rucker, a daily national radio commentary called "Just the Facts" that has been airing since 1993 on some 200 radio stations from coast to coast. Rothbard received his Bachelor of Arts degree from Fairfield University.
